    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3387</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Time line of Ancient History of Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitzeile der alten Geschichte von Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne de temps de l'histoire antique de 
Jérusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha do tempo do history antigo de Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga di tempo di storia antica di Gerusalemme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική γραμμή αρχαίας ιστορίας της Ιερουσαλήμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Línea del tiempo de la historia antigua de 
Jerusalén</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive time line of Ancient History of Jerusalem,from the Pre-first temple period in 4500BC until the late Islamic Period 1187 to 1917</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Archeology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temple mount</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Zeitzeile der alten Geschichte 
von Jerusalem, von der Vor-ersten Bügelperiode in 4500BC bis die 
späte islamische Periode 1187 bis 1917</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une ligne interactive de temps de l'histoire 
antique de Jérusalem, de la Pré-première période de temple dans 
4500BC jusqu'à la défunte période islamique 1187 à 1917</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma linha interativa do tempo do history antigo 
de Jerusalem, do Pre-primeiro período do temple em 4500BC até o 
período islamic atrasado 1187 a 1917</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una riga interattiva di tempo di storia antica di
Gerusalemme, dal Pre-primo periodo del tempiale in 4500BC fino ai 
periodi islamico tardo 1187 - 1917</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική χρονική γραμμή αρχαίας ιστορίας της 
Ιερουσαλήμ, από την προ-πρώτη περίοδο ναών σε 4500BC μέχρι 
την πρόσφατη ισλαμική περίοδο 1187 έως 1917</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una línea interactiva del tiempo de la historia 
antigua de Jerusalén, a partir del Pre-primer período del templo en 
4500BC hasta el último período islámico 1187 a 1917</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
